ceci-dataview/description: Display any data you have created using forms made with addform component.
ceci-dataview/attributes/dataname/descri: Will try to show this kind of item in the saved data, i.e. 'Cats'
ceci-dataview/attributes/showdelete/desc: Hides or shows the delete icon for each record.
ceci-dataview/attributes/showedit/descri: Hides or shows the Edit button for each record.
ceci-dataview/attributes/showaddtoitem/d: Hides or shows the 'Add to This' button
